column1: The '''''J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1996''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[HarperCollins]] on [[10 July]] [[1995]]. It features art by [[Ted Nasmith]] based on ''[[The Hobbit]]'', ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Silmarillion]]''.

* February - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - The Willow Man is Tamed.jpg
* May - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Fifth Day After Weathertop.jpg
* June - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Tuor Reaches the Hidden City of Gondolin.jpg
column2: Tuor Reaches the Hidden City of Gondolin]]"
